verses.text: Now these \add are\add* the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w*, and \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* toward the \w rising|strong="H4217"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, from the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w* unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hermon|strong="H2768"\w*, and all the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w* on the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*:

\w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, who \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, \add and\add* \w ruled|strong="H4910"\w* from \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w*, which \add is\add* upon the \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*, and from the \w middle|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w*, and from \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, even unto the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Jabbok|strong="H2999"\w*, \add which is\add* the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*;

And from the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w* to the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* of \w Chinneroth|strong="H3672"\w* on the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, and unto the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* of the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w*, \add even\add* the \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* on the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* to \w Beth-jeshimoth|strong="H1020"\w*; and from the \w south|strong="H8486"\w*, under \w Ashdoth-pisgah|strong="H0798"\w*:\f + \fr 12.3 \ft the south: or, Teman\f*\f + \fr 12.3 \ft Ashdoth-pisgah: or, the springs of Pisgah, or, the hill\f*

¶ And the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \add which was\add* of the \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w giants|strong="H7497"\w*, that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Ashtaroth|strong="H6252"\w* and at \w Edrei|strong="H0154"\w*,

And \w reigned|strong="H4910"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hermon|strong="H2768"\w*, and in \w Salcah|strong="H5548"\w*, and in all \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, unto the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w Geshurites|strong="H1651"\w* and the \w Maachathites|strong="H4602"\w*, and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*.

Them did \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w*: and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* it \add for\add* a \w possession|strong="H3425"\w* unto the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w*, and the \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w*, and the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.

¶ And these \add are\add* the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* which \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* on the \w west|strong="H3220"\w*, from \w Baal-gad|strong="H1171"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H1237"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* even unto the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Halak|strong="H2510"\w*, that goeth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*; which \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add for\add* a \w possession|strong="H3425"\w* according to their \w divisions|strong="H4256"\w*;

In the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and in the \w valleys|strong="H8219"\w*, and in the \w plains|strong="H6160"\w*, and in the \w springs|strong="H0794"\w*, and in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and in the south \w country|strong="H5045"\w*; the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, the \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, the \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, and the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*:

¶ The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*, which \add is\add* \w beside|strong="H6654"\w* \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;
The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;
The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jarmuth|strong="H3412"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;
The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;
The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Geder|strong="H1445"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;
The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Hormah|strong="H2767"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Arad|strong="H6166"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;
The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Adullam|strong="H5725"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;
The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Makkedah|strong="H4719"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;
The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Tappuah|strong="H8599"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;

The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Aphek|strong="H0663"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Lasharon|strong="H8289"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;\f + \fr 12.18 \ft Lasharon: or, Sharon\f*
The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Madon|strong="H4068"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;
The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Shimron-meron|strong="H8112"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Achshaph|strong="H0407"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;
The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Taanach|strong="H8590"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Megiddo|strong="H4023"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;

The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Kedesh|strong="H6943"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jokneam|strong="H3362"\w* of \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;

The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Dor|strong="H1756"\w* in the \w coast|strong="H5299"\w* of \w Dor|strong="H1756"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* of \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*;
The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w*: all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w one|strong="H0259"\w*.
